front.title: Report from the IAB/W3C Workshop on Age-Based Restrictions on Content Access

abstract.t: The Workshop on Age-Based Restrictions on Content Access was convened by the Internet Architecture Board (IAB) and World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) in October 2025. This report summarizes its significant points of discussion and identifies topics that may warrant further consideration and work. Note that this document is a report on the proceedings of the workshop. The views and positions documented in this report are those of the workshop participants and do not necessarily reflect IAB or W3C views and positions.
